00014 #ifndef NB_BLACKADDER_H
00015 #define NB_BLACKADDER_H
00016 
00017 #include "blackadder_c.h"
00018 
00019 struct _nb_ba_handle;
00020 typedef struct _nb_ba_handle *nb_ba_handle;
00021 typedef void (*nb_ba_callbacktype)(ba_event);
00022 
00023 /*
00024  * We use C macro magic to wrap the publish_*(), unpublish_*(),
00025  * subscribe_*() and unsubscribe_*() functions.
00026  *
00027  * The parameters for these functions, except for publish_data(),
00028  * are the same.
00029  *
00030  * nb_ba_<[un]publish|[un]subscribe>_<scope|info>(
00031  *     nb_ba_handle ba,
00032  *     const char *id, unsigned int id_len,
00033  *     const char *prefix_id, unsigned int prefix_id_len,
00034  *     unsigned char strategy,
00035  *     void *str_opt, unsigned int str_opt_len)
00036  *
00037  * nb_ba_publish_data(
00038  *     nb_ba_handle ba,
00039  *     const char *id, unsigned int id_len,
00040  *     unsigned char strategy,
00041  *     void *str_opt, unsigned int str_opt_len,
00042  *     void *data, unsigned int data_len
00043  */
00044 
00045 #define _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(f_name)  _XX_BA_FUNC_DECL(nb_ba, f_name)
00046 #define _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL_DATA(f_name)  _XX_BA_FUNC_DECL_DATA(nb_ba, f_name)
00047 
00048 #ifdef __cplusplus
00049 #define _NB_BA_FUNC_DEF(f_name)  _XX_BA_FUNC_DEF(nb_ba, NB_Blackadder, f_name)
00050 #define _NB_BA_FUNC_DEF_DATA(f_name)  _XX_BA_FUNC_DEF_DATA(nb_ba, NB_Blackadder, f_name)
00051 
00052 struct _nb_ba_handle {
00053     NB_Blackadder *instance;
00054 };
00055 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00056 
00057 /*
00058  * Blackadder pub/sub functions.
00059  */
00060 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(publish_scope);
00061 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(publish_info);
00062 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(unpublish_scope);
00063 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(unpublish_info);
00064 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(subscribe_scope);
00065 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(subscribe_info);
00066 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(unsubscribe_scope);
00067 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL(unsubscribe_info);
00068 
00069 _NB_BA_FUNC_DECL_DATA(publish_data);
00070 
00071 /*
00072  * Other NB_Blackadder instance functions.
00073  */
00074 nb_ba_handle nb_ba_instance(int user_space);
00075 void nb_ba_delete(nb_ba_handle ba);
00076 void nb_ba_disconnect(nb_ba_handle ba);
00077 
00078 void nb_ba_set_callback(nb_ba_handle ba, nb_ba_callbacktype cf);
00079 void nb_ba_selector(nb_ba_handle ba, void *arg);
00080 void nb_ba_worker(nb_ba_handle ba, void *arg);
00081 void nb_ba_signal_handler(nb_ba_handle ba, int sig);
00082 void nb_ba_join(nb_ba_handle ba);
00083 
00084 #endif /* NB_BLACKADDER_H */
